help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers to common questions and learn how to use SVMSeek Wallet

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.whatIsThisAnswer: SVMSeek Wallet is a secure, non-custodial wallet for the Solana blockchain. It allows you to store, send, and receive SOL and SPL tokens while maintaining full control of your private keys.
gettingStarted.feature1: Secure storage of SOL and SPL tokens
gettingStarted.feature2: Direct integration with SVMSeek DEX for trading
gettingStarted.feature3: Multi-account support with hardware wallet integration
gettingStarted.feature4: Comprehensive transaction history and portfolio tracking
gettingStarted.howToStartAnswer: Getting started with SVMSeek Wallet is easy:
gettingStarted.step1: Create a new wallet or restore an existing one
gettingStarted.step2: Securely store your seed phrase (very important!)
gettingStarted.step3: Set a strong password for your wallet
gettingStarted.step4: Start receiving tokens and exploring the Solana ecosystem
gettingStarted.requirement1: Modern web browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
gettingStarted.requirement3: Hardware wallets (Ledger, Trezor) for enhanced security

wallet.title: Wallet Management
wallet.createWallet: How do I create a new wallet?
wallet.createWalletAnswer: Creating a new wallet generates a unique seed phrase that controls your funds:
wallet.createStep1: Click 'Create New Wallet' on the welcome screen
wallet.createStep2: Write down your 12-word seed phrase on paper
wallet.createStep3: Verify your seed phrase by selecting words in order
wallet.createStep4: Set a strong password to encrypt your wallet
wallet.seedPhraseWarning: Never share your seed phrase with anyone! Anyone with access to your seed phrase can control your funds.
wallet.restoreWallet: How do I restore an existing wallet?
wallet.restoreWalletAnswer: You can restore your wallet using your seed phrase:
wallet.restoreStep1: Click 'Restore Wallet' on the welcome screen
wallet.restoreStep2: Enter your 12-word seed phrase in the correct order
wallet.restoreStep3: Set a new password for this device
wallet.multipleAccountsAnswer: Yes! SVMSeek Wallet supports multiple accounts from the same seed phrase.
wallet.multipleAccountsDetails: Each account has its own address and can hold different tokens. You can create unlimited accounts and organize them into groups.
wallet.hardwareWallet: Can I use a hardware wallet?
wallet.hardwareWalletAnswer: Yes, SVMSeek Wallet supports hardware wallets for enhanced security.

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.sendTokensAnswer: Sending tokens is simple and secure:
transactions.sendStep1: Go to your wallet and click 'Send'
transactions.sendStep3: Select the token and enter the amount
transactions.sendStep4: Review the transaction details and fees
transactions.sendStep5: Confirm the transaction with your password
transactions.receiveTokensAnswer: To receive tokens, you need to share your wallet address:
transactions.receiveInstructions: Click 'Receive' to see your address and QR code. Share this address with the sender.
transactions.transactionFeesAnswer: Transaction fees (gas fees) are required to process transactions on the Solana network.
transactions.feeDetails: Fees are very low on Solana, typically less than $0.01 per transaction.
transactions.transactionHistory: How do I view my transaction history?
transactions.transactionHistoryAnswer: Your complete transaction history is available in the wallet.
transactions.historyFeatures: You can filter transactions by date, amount, and token type, and export your history for record-keeping.

security.title: Security
security.seedPhraseSecurity: How do I keep my seed phrase secure?
security.seedPhraseSecurityAnswer: Your seed phrase is the master key to your wallet. Security is crucial:
security.neverShare: Never share your seed phrase with anyone, including SVMSeek support team.
security.storageRecommendations: Store it offline on paper, metal backup, or secure hardware devices. Never store it digitally or take screenshots.
security.passwordSecurity: How important is my wallet password?
security.passwordSecurityAnswer: Your wallet password encrypts your seed phrase on your device.
security.passwordTips: Use a strong, unique password. If you forget it, you can restore your wallet using your seed phrase.
security.phishingProtection: How do I avoid phishing attacks?
security.phishingProtectionAnswer: Always verify you're on the official SVMSeek website before entering sensitive information.

trading.title: Trading & DeFi
trading.howToTradeAnswer: SVMSeek Wallet integrates directly with SVMSeek DEX for seamless trading.
trading.tradingFeatures: Access spot trading, advanced charts, and real-time market data directly from your wallet.
trading.swapTokensAnswer: Token swapping allows you to exchange one token for another instantly.
trading.swapProcess: Select the tokens you want to swap, enter the amount, review the rate, and confirm the transaction.
trading.liquidityPoolsAnswer: Liquidity pools allow you to provide liquidity to the DEX and earn rewards.
trading.poolBenefits: By providing liquidity, you earn a portion of the trading fees generated by the pool.

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.connectionIssuesAnswer: If you're experiencing connection problems, try these steps:
troubleshooting.connectionStep2: Refresh the page or restart the application
troubleshooting.connectionStep3: Try switching to a different RPC endpoint in settings
troubleshooting.connectionStep4: Clear your browser cache and cookies
troubleshooting.transactionFailedAnswer: Transaction failures can occur for several reasons:
troubleshooting.commonCauses: Common causes include insufficient balance for fees, network congestion, or incorrect recipient address.
troubleshooting.balanceNotShowingAnswer: Balance display issues are usually temporary:
troubleshooting.refreshInstructions: Try refreshing the page or manually syncing your wallet. Network delays can cause temporary display issues.
troubleshooting.resetWallet: How do I reset my wallet?
troubleshooting.resetWalletAnswer: You can reset your wallet if you're experiencing persistent issues:
troubleshooting.resetWarning: Only reset your wallet if you have your seed phrase safely stored. Resetting will remove all local data.
